Title: USDA FoodData Central
Description: A comprehensive U.S. government resource for animal-based food nutrient data, including meats, dairy, and eggs.

Title: EFSA (European Food Safety Authority)
Description: Provides scientific advice and data on animal products in the EU, including meats, fish, eggs, and milk.

Title: NIH (National Institutes of Health)
Description: Offers data on animal nutrition, focusing on vitamins, minerals, and bioactive compounds in meats and animal products.

Title: National Agricultural Library (NAL)
Description: Offers various animal-product resources like Nutrient Data Laboratory, and includes comprehensive food composition data.

Title: Meat & Livestock Australia
Description: Provides detailed data on the nutritional composition of various animal meats and products, especially lamb and beef.
